mapper.select: select q.qna_no, q.title, q.content, q.created_dt, q.view_cnt, q.reply, q.status, u.id owner_id, c.title category_title, f.filepath from ftp_support_qna q inner join ftp_user u on q.user_no=u.user_no inner join ftp_support_qna_category c on q.qna_category_no=c.qna_category_no left outer join ftp_support_qna_file f on q.qna_no=f.qna_no order by qna_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into ftp_support_qna( user_no, qna_category_no, title, content, password, status) values( #{owner.no}, #{qnaType.no}, #{title}, #{content}, password(#{qnaPassword}), #{status})
mapper.select: select q.qna_no, q.title, q.content, q.password, q.created_dt, q.view_cnt, q.reply, q.status, u.id owner_id, c.title category_title, f.filepath from ftp_support_qna q inner join ftp_user u on q.user_no=u.user_no inner join ftp_support_qna_category c on q.qna_category_no=c.qna_category_no left outer join ftp_support_qna_file f on q.qna_no=f.qna_no where q.qna_no=#{no}
select password from ftp_support_qna where qna_no=#{qnaNo} and password=password(#{userPassword})

select q.qna_no, q.title, q.content, q.created_dt, q.view_cnt, u.id owner_id, c.title category_title, f.filepath from ftp_support_qna q inner join ftp_user u on q.user_no=u.user_no inner join ftp_support_qna_category c on q.qna_category_no=c.qna_category_no left outer join ftp_support_qna_file f on q.qna_no=f.qna_no
q.title like (concat('%', #{value}, '%'))
or q.content like (concat('%', #{value}, '%'))
or u.id like (concat('%', #{value}, '%'))
order by qna_no desc
